item.title: RestTemplate的post请求中文乱码问题
item.author: liupengliang1012@gmail.com (Allen)
item.description: ###1.问题重现 需调用的接口如下： @RequestMapping(value = "/test", method = RequestMethod.POST) public Object createTransGet(HttpServletRequest request, HttpServletResponse response,@RequestBody String text) { System.out.println(text); return "ok"; } RestTemplate调用接口的代码如下： @Test public void test9() throws UnsupportedEncodingException{ RestTemplate restTemplate = new RestTemplate();
